articles.title: About 40% of Japan's population have infection-derived Covid antibody - Morung Express
articles.description: Tokyo, March 24 (IANS) Japan's Health Ministry has found that about 40 per cent of people as of last month had a type of coronavirus antibody which can only be acquired through infection, local media reported on Friday.
